import _classCallCheck from"C:/SKRYPTY/KROSNO/TypeScript/ProjektTS/PrzykladyTSReact/myreactapp/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck.js";import _createClass from"C:/SKRYPTY/KROSNO/TypeScript/ProjektTS/PrzykladyTSReact/myreactapp/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/createClass.js";import SBook from"./SBook";var SBookList=/*#__PURE__*/function(){function SBookList(){_classCallCheck(this,SBookList);this.books=void 0;this.books=[];}_createClass(SBookList,[{key:"add",value:function add(book){this.books.push(book);}},{key:"get",value:function get(index){return this.books[index];}},{key:"size",value:function size(){return this.books.length;}},{key:"remove",value:function remove(index){if(index>=0&&index<this.books.length){this.books.splice(index,1);}}},{key:"getCopy",value:function getCopy(){var locBookList=new SBookList();if(this.size()>0){for(var i=0;i<this.size();i=i+1){var book=this.get(i);locBookList.add(book);}}return locBookList;}//Utworzenie bazy poczatkowej ksiazek
},{key:"build",value:function build(){var b1=new SBook("Hobbit","Tolkien","455");var b2=new SBook("Rok 1984","Orwell","455");var b3=new SBook("Władca Pierścieni","Tolkien","669");var b4=new SBook("Stary człowiek i morze","Hemingway","226");this.add(b1);this.add(b2);this.add(b3);this.add(b4);}},{key:"selectBooks",value:function selectBooks(){if(this.size()>0){var nbooks=[];for(var i=0;i<this.size();i=i+1){var book=this.get(i);var author=book.author;if(author=="Tolkien"){nbooks.push(book);}}this.books=nbooks;}}},{key:"filtrBooks",value:function filtrBooks(filtrText){if(this.size()>0){var filter=filtrText.toUpperCase();var nbooks=[];for(var i=0;i<this.size();i=i+1){var book=this.get(i);var author=book.author;var title=book.title;var text=author+" "+title;text=text.toUpperCase();if(text.includes(filter)){nbooks.push(book);}}this.books=nbooks;}}},{key:"addBook",value:function addBook(){var b=new SBook("Pan Tadeusz","Mickiewicz","345");this.add(b);}}]);return SBookList;}();export default SBookList;
